help.title: Help & Tips
help.getting_started_content:
AI StockAlert monitors your selected stocks in real-time and sends alerts via Windows notifications, WhatsApp, or email when prices cross your defined thresholds.

1. Add stocks to monitor in the Tickers tab
2. Set high and low price thresholds for each stock
3. Enable the Background Service in Settings to receive alerts 24/7
4. Close the app - the service keeps running and sending alerts!
help.settings_tips_content:
• Check Interval: How often the app fetches new prices. Lower values mean more frequent updates but use more API calls. Recommended: 1-5 minutes for active trading, 15-30 minutes for casual monitoring.

• Cooldown Period: Prevents repeated alerts for the same stock. After an alert fires, you won't get another for that stock until the cooldown expires. Recommended: 5-15 minutes.

• Alert Channels: Choose how you want to be notified - Windows notifications, WhatsApp, or email. You can enable multiple channels.
help.tickers_content:
• Add Ticker: Enter the stock symbol (e.g., AAPL, MSFT, GOOGL) and set your price thresholds.

• High Threshold: You'll be alerted when the price rises ABOVE this value.

• Low Threshold: You'll be alerted when the price falls BELOW this value.

• Toggle Enabled: Temporarily disable monitoring for a stock without deleting it.
help.alerts_content:
• Alerts appear as Windows notifications when a stock crosses your threshold.

• Click the notification to open a price chart for that stock.

• The app respects market hours - no alerts during weekends or holidays.

• WhatsApp Alerts: Requires your phone number in the Profile tab.
help.service_content:
• The Background Service allows StockAlert to monitor prices and send alerts even when the GUI is closed.

• Go to Settings > Background Service and click 'Start Service' to enable it.

• The service runs silently in the background until you stop it or restart your computer.

• Your settings and ticker configuration are automatically picked up by the service when you save changes.
